projects.title: Laerdal Medical
projects.description: Made the prototype for Android app for showing feedback from the "Resusci Anni" CPR training manikin. App displayed graphs of compression depth+rate and ventilation rate. Also sent live data to nodejs backend and displayed on clients using socket.io
